titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for certain committees for the 111th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works

bill.summary: 5/5/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates minority party membership on the following Senate committees for the 111th Congress: (1) Appropriations; (2) Environment and Public Works; (3) the Judiciary; (4) Veterans' Affairs; and (5) Aging.
